sections.whoWeAre: SzigetNavi is a navigation and info app designed for Sziget Festival and other event-goers. It helps users find friends, stages, food, and services without collecting personal data.

whatWeCollect.location: Only accessed on user permission. No storage or transmission.
whatWeCollect.savedPins: May be stored locally in future versions.
whatWeCollect.purchaseReceipts: Stored locally if user donates. Stripe handles all payment data.
whatWeCollect.languagePreference: Stored locally and optionally sent to enable UI preferences.
whatWeCollect.analytics: Currently none. May be added later, with disclosure.

sections.whyWeCollect: We do not collect personal data. Local storage supports user experience only.
sections.storageAndSecurity: All data is stored in the user's device local storage. No syncing or remote storage. Risks include device loss or browser clearing.
sections.dataSharing: No data is sent to or shared with any external service. Location sharing is user-initiated and voluntary.

userRights.reset: Users can clear all local data using the built-in 'Reset App' feature.
userRights.deletionRequest: Not applicable — no central data is stored.
userRights.export: Not supported, as no data is stored externally.
